name: Clutch
one_liner: Coming through in a high-pressure situation; extremely timely and helpful.
meaning: Successful under pressure / Exactly what was needed.
usage: Complimenting someone for solving a problem at the last minute.
example_lines: You coming through with the charger was clutch
He's always clutch when the game is on the line
do_not_use_if: The situation was easy or not time-sensitive
